add_row.description: The label for the add row button

delete_row.description: The label for the delete row button

add_column.description: The label for the add column button

delete_column.description: The label for the delete column button

make_graph.description: The label for the make graph button

show_starter_sentence.description: The label for the show starter sentence button

save.description: The label for the save button

click_make_graph.value: 点击“制作图表”以便用数据制作图表
click_make_graph.description: The message to tell the student to click the make graph button

are_you_sure_you_want_reset.description: The message to ask the student if they are sure they want to reset the table

table_has_changed_click_make_graph.value: 表格内容已更改，点击“制作图标”以便用新的数据制作图表
table_has_changed_click_make_graph.description: The message to tell the student that the table has changed so they should click the make graph button

x_axis.description: The label for the x axis

y_axis.description: The label for the y axis

x_min.description: The label for the x min

x_max.description: The label for the x max

y_min.description: The label for the y min

y_max.description: The label for the y max

error_data_in_table_invalid.value: 错误：无效的表格数据，请改正表格中的数据并重试
error_data_in_table_invalid.description: The error message that is displayed when the student tries to make the graph with invalid table data

error_unable_to_draw_chart.description: The error message that is displayed when we are unable to draw the chart

invalid_x_min.description: The error message to show when the x min value is invalid

invalid_y_min.description: The error message to show when the y min value is invalid

invalid_x_max.description: The error message to show when the x max value is invalid

invalid_y_max.description: The error message to show when y max value is invalid

error_you_must_fix.value: 错误：你必需改正下面的错误才可以绘制图表
error_you_must_fix.description: The error message to tell the student they need to fix the problems before they can make the graph

are_you_sure_delete_column.value: 你确定要删除右边的这一表格列？
are_you_sure_delete_column.description: The confirmation message to ask the student if they are sure they want to delete the column

error_may_not_delete_original_columns.value: 错误：你可能无法删除任何原始表格列
error_may_not_delete_original_columns.description: The error message telling the student they can't delete columns that were authored by the teacher

are_you_sure_delete_row.value: 你确定要删除表格的最后一行？
are_you_sure_delete_row.description: The confirmation message to ask the student if they are sure they want to delete the row

error_may_not_delete_original_rows.value: 错误：你可能无法删除任何原始表格行
error_may_not_delete_original_rows.description: The error message telling the student they can't delete rows that were authored by the teacher

saved_feedback.description: Notification that the table data was saved

reset_table.description: The label for the reset table button
